title: 92/410/EEC: Council Decision of 27 July 1992 on the conclusion of the Agreement in the form of an exchange of letters on the provisional application of the Protocol establishing, for the period from 3 May 1992 to 2 May 1994, the fishing opportunities and financial compensation provided for in the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Government of the People' s Republic of Angola on fishing off Angola
header:
COUNCIL DECISION  of 27 July 1992  on the conclusion of the Agreement in the form of an exchange of letters on the provisional application of the Protocol establishing, for the period from 3 May 1992 to 2 May 1994, the fishing opportunities and  financial compensation provided for in the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Government of the People's Republic of Angola on fishing off Angola  (92/410/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Agreement in the form of an exchange of letters on the provisional application of the Protocol establishing, for the period from 3 May 1992 to 2 May 1994, the fishing opportunities and financial compensation provided for in the Agreement  between the European Economic Community and the Government of the People's Republic of Angola on fishing off Angola is hereby approved on behalf of the Community.
The text of the Agreement is attached to this Decision.
The President of the Council is hereby authorized to designate the persons empowered to sign the Agreement in the form of an exchange of letters in order to bind the Community.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 July 1992. For the Council
The President
N. LAMONT
(1) OJ No L 341, 3. 12. 1987, p. 1.
